m_szDocTitle: Patent US9005809 - Electrochemical cells comprising porous structures comprising sulfur - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Electrochemical cells comprising porous structures comprising sulfur US 9005809 B2 Abstract The present invention relates to the use of porous structures comprising sulfur in electrochemical cells. Such materials may be useful, for example, in forming one or more electrodes in an electrochemical cell. For example, the systems and methods described herein may comprise the use of an electrode comprising a conductive porous support structure and a plurality of particles comprising sulfur (e.g., as an active species) substantially contained within the pores of the support structure. The inventors
